articles.author: Natasha Chen
articles.title: The ‘self-inflicted injury’ to US tourism that’s making some Americans angry and disappointed - CNN
articles.description: Many international travelers are skipping the US this year. ““I am super-duper angry. I’m also disappointed,” said one business owner who’s feeling the effects of tourists staying away.
articles.content:
Joe Koenen has not seen a single Toronto Blue Jays baseball hat all summer.
Typically, Canadians will flood the streets of Seattle during the summer, but Koenen, who runs Seattle Free Walking Tours … [+11646 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: The Night Sky In September 2025: Two Eclipses, Bright Aurora And Saturn - Forbes
articles.description: Each month, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the weeks ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere).
articles.content: The aurora borealis, where the rays or rayed bands of the Northern Lights to converge to a point where they form a crown, seen in an incredible display in the skies above Holy Island in Northumberlan… [+6489 chars]
